{"data": {"production":{"id":"babies","production_title":"Babies","production_status":3,"production_desc":"

The adventure of a lifetime begins...<\/p>

Directed by award-winning filmmaker Thomas Balm`es, from an original idea by producer Alain Chabat, Babies<\/em><\/strong> simultaneously follows four babies around the world - from birth to first steps. The children are, respectively, in order of on-screen introduction: Ponijao, who lives with her family near Opuwo, Namibia; Bayarjargal, who resides with his family in Mongolia, near Bayanchandmani; Mari, who lives with her family in Tokyo, Japan; and Hattie, who resides with her family in the United States, in San Francisco.<\/p>

Re-defining the nonfiction art form, Babies<\/em> joyfully captures on film the earliest stages of the journey of humanity that are at once unique and universal to us all.<\/p>","in_theaters":"

May 7, 2010<\/p>","date_release":"2010-05-07","division":"focus_features","logo":"","rating_img":"","show_grid":0,"show_grid_filters":0,"show_in_theaters":0,"show_awards_intro":0,"meta_title":"Babies Movie | Official Website | Buy Now | Focus Features","meta_desc":"A visually stunning and joyful new film that simultaneously chronicles the lives of four of the world's newest human inhabitants - in Mongolia, Namibia, San Francisco, and Tokyo, respectively -- from first breath to first steps, on a journey at once universal and amazingly original.","meta_keywords":"Babies Film,buy Babies DVD,buy Babies Blu-Ray,Thomas Balm`es","meta_img":"http:\/\/focusmicrosites.s3.amazonaws.com\/assets\/img\/og-meta.png","facebook":"https:\/\/www.facebook.com\/FocusFeatures\/","twitter":"https:\/\/twitter.com\/FocusFeatures","instagram":"https:\/\/www.instagram.com\/focusfeatures\/","youtube_channel":"https:\/\/www.youtube.com\/user\/FocusFeatures","tumblr_url":"","dvd_url":"https:\/\/www.amazon.com\/Babies-Thomas-Balmes\/dp\/B002ZG974M\/ref=sr_1_2_twi_dvd_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1484692939&sr=8-2&keywords=Babies+Movie","bluray_url":"https:\/\/www.amazon.com\/Babies-4-Countries\/dp\/B004N4YQ9K\/ref=tmm_blu_swatch_0?_encoding=UTF8&qid=1484692939&sr=8-2","ondemand_url":"https:\/\/www.uphe.com\/movies\/babies","itunes_url":"https:\/\/itunes.apple.com\/us\/movie\/babies\/id383844949","moviefone_id":"","movietickets_id":"","fandango_id":"","related_film_title":null,"related_film_url":"http:\/\/focusfeatures.com\/","related_film_thumb":"","code_head":"","code_body_top":"","code_body_bottom":"","theme_colors":"","theme_fonts":"","theme_hl":"97,147,214","theme_bg":"","intro_video_id":0,"categories":[],"gallery":[],"backgrounds":[],"modules":[{"module_id":"3","title":"OWN IT","alignment":"left"},{"module_id":"7","title":"SOCIAL","alignment":"right"}],"news":[],"partners":[],"reactions":[],"trending":[],"castcrew":[{"id":"3642","full_name":"Thomas Balm`es","person_role":"
